name: [+18]Wellwood
description:
(Downloading the builds always yield better performance)

WASD - movement

Right click - attack

Left Click - enter cast mode

C - exit cast mode

E - interact (when the ! symbol is present)

X - exit "interaction" with enemy

Wellwood is a free to play NSFW fantasy adventure made in unity, the first entry of a series of games called "The fall of Mandiath".

You play as Celesta, a dragon hybrid, that wakes up on Everlost woods, wondering how did she get there, she remembers how to use her lust magic, a rare gift among dragons(even more on hybrids).

Even thought v0.1 is small, it already contains the base for both HTML and Windows Builds(MAC and Linux needs testing), in the near future more features will be implemented:

  • Ability trees, Level up, xp and attributes.
  • Crafting, looting and foraging.
  • Equipment, economy and Items.
  • Companions.
  • Visual novel inspired narrative with dating elements.
  • Quest, side missions and multiple endings.
  • Gallery(The lewd scenes will be collectibles)
  •  Universal Save system(The save files from any platform will work with every other platform, play with your save where you want, how you want.)

There's a lot to do!

If you would like to support the development of Wellwood and future games, please consider Supporting me on Patreon!

Consider supporting Wellwood!

Keep in touch with my twitter!

if you happen to find any bugs(and there will be a lot), please send me an DM here, on patreon or on twitter.

Thank you so much for playing, it means the world for me!
